channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15707] ImportTSV bulk output does not support tags with hfile.format.version=3
item.description:
Running the following command:


hbase hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.ImportTsv \ 

-Dhfile.format.version=3 \ 

-Dmapreduce.map.combine.minspills=1 \ 

-Dimporttsv.separator=, \ 

-Dimporttsv.skip.bad.lines=false \ 

-Dimporttsv.columns="HBASE_ROW_KEY,cf1:a,HBASE_CELL_TTL" \ 

-Dimporttsv.bulk.output=/tmp/testttl/output/1 \ 

testttl \ 

/tmp/testttl/input

The content of input is like:


row1,data1,00000060 

row2,data2,00000660 

row3,data3,00000060 

row4,data4,00000660

When running hfile tool with the output hfile, there is no ttl tag.
item.summary: ImportTSV bulk output does not support tags with hfile.format.version=3

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
359	  @Ignore("Goes zombie too frequently; needs work. See HBASE-14563")

How often does it go zombie ?
Ted Yu, Sorry, it should not go zombie at all, a copy paste error. Uploading a new patch which removes this line, thanks for review.

This message was automatically generated.
Understood the checkstyle warning, will provide a new patch, thanks Ted Yu!

Looking closer at the checkstyle warning:


./hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/HFileOutputFormat2.java:133:  static <V extends Cell> RecordWriter<ImmutableBytesWritable, V>:3: error: Method length is 218 lines (max allowed is 150).

Since the method was exceeding recommended length of 150 before the patch, I think we can address the above in another issue.

+1 from me.
Yeah, the function has an anonymous class inline so making it exceeding the 150 line limit. I was considering to separate the anonymous class..., thanks Ted Yu.

Patch doesn't compile on branch-1

Mind attaching patch for branch-1 ?

Thanks
Thanks Ted Yu, I will work on a branch-1 patch.
